comments.body: This new line should be the only change to the `docs/docsite/rst/dev_guide/developing_module_utilities` file. Please remove/undo the other changes.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@.. include:: shared_snippets/licensing.txt

- alicloud_ecs.py - Definitions and utilities for modules working with Alibaba Cloud ECS.
- api.py - Adds shared support for generic API modules.
- azure_rm_common.py - Definitions and utilities for Microsoft Azure Resource Manager template deployments.
